item.title: The Clare Locke Letter (Moscow, ID) | The Fallout of Practical Pastoring + Backstage [CrossPolitic Show]
item.description:
Jared Longshore Stops in a bit to offer some of his perspective on Christ Church taking legal action against Examining Doug Wilson & Moscow Idaho. 

 

Doug Wilson’s Blog on the Letter

https://dougwils.com/books-and-culture/s7-engaging-the-culture/a-long-overdue-letter.html 

 

See the Entire Letter Here

https://drive.google.com/file/d/10UgGavHolq5xNGYE9--OPWZXfKqdaeeP/view

item.title: Making Sense of Tucker/Putin - Russia Ukraine History w/ Larry Taunton [CrossPolitic Show]
item.description:
Today the guys have Larry Taunton on to talk about Tucker Carlson’s interview with Putin. 

 

Larry Taunton is an Author & columnist with contributions to USA Today, First Things, The Atlantic, Spectator, CNN, New York Post, etc. He is also a Redeemed former cyclist. 

For more from Larry: https://larryalextaunton.com

item.title: Christians are the Minority | Life in the Negative World w/ Aaron Renn [CrossPolitic Show]
item.description:
Aaron Renn is a writer and consultant in Indianapolis who is a co-founder and Senior Fellow at American Reformer. He compels insights on society, Christianity, family, cities, politics and economics. 

 

 

More from Aaron Renn: https://www.aaronrenn.com/
